title: [Large-scale] Age-Friendly Multimedia Learning Design: Customized Strategies for Adult Learners Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Operates in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, requiring multimedia design that addresses learners' reduced working memory capacity

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three multimedia content design principles reflecting age-related cognitive characteristics.
Learners can effectively produce educational materials using voice explanations and redundant text in smartphone environments.
Learners can present strategies for utilizing age-appropriate visual aids through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
